name: Bin-Topia
description:
The year is 2599.

The human population has mostly disappeared leaving behind the remnants of their once great civilisation. Vast cities of high rise buildings, bridges and other amazing feats of engineering all reduced to rubble. But the most important thing left behind...their delicious delicious trash!

Our bins are running dry but thankfully, legends speak of a magical land where we bin chickens can live in peace, never wanting for anything. Today I make the perilous journey to Bin-Topia!

In this simple platform style game. Learn what Barry the Bin Chicken is capable of as you navigate him through the post apocalyptic world to reach the ultimate goal with a few surprises along the way!
